ygData.subject: RE: BQ (Bards Quarterly) A few words about bards and fa shion
ygData.msgSnippet: No you are not crazy, i did this for my entire EQ life until two days ago. i wore a full set of rubicite for looks (minus appalling helm of course), even
ygData.messageBody:
No you are not crazy, i did this for my entire EQ life until two days ago.
i wore a full set of rubicite for looks (minus appalling helm of course),
even though i had mithril bracers and chest, serpentine bracers, elf-hide
gloves, dwarven work boots, etc. well finally the stats on the armor in
Fear have finally won me over. So all i need is the BP to start looking
great again. for now it is rubi gloves, serpentine bracers, azure sleeves,
rubi BP, and imbrued (yellow armor from fear) boots and legs. one i get the
yellow bp and get some elf-hide gloves back i can be happy with my looks
again. not quite sure how badly the rubi and yellow clash.

Shada

> Any way, am I crazy or does
> anyone else use lesser items in favor of how they
> look?
>
> Llewrend Lynnhaven
>
